meaningMnemonic: It <kanji>honorable</kanji>(y) becomes (なる) that you <kanji>look at</kanji> something. This is a respectful way to say <vocabulary>to look</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to please look</vocabulary> at something. The reading を御覧になって下さい！
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
